definition.datasource:
import pickle import sys import json
varname = json.loads('$(varname)')
pmsenv = ds.$(msenv) if sys.version_info > (3,): msenv = pickle.loads(pmsenv[1], encoding='latin1')['new'] else: msenv = pickle.loads(pmsenv[1])['new']
ds.result = msenv for var in varname: ds.result = ds.result[var]
$datasources.$(msenv)
